name: io.github.microsoft/fluentui-blazor-mcp
description: MCP server providing documentation for Fluent UI Blazor components. Access component details, parameters, events, methods, enums, guides, and usage examples through AI assistants.

tools.name: ListComponents
tools.description: Lists all available Fluent UI Blazor components with their names and brief descriptions.

tools.name: GetComponentDetails
tools.description: Gets detailed documentation for a specific component including parameters, events, and methods.

tools.name: SearchComponents
tools.description: Searches for components by name or description.

tools.name: GetEnumValues
tools.description: Gets information about a specific enum type including all possible values. Supports optional filter parameter.

tools.name: GetComponentEnums
tools.description: Lists all enum types used by a specific component, showing which property/parameter uses each enum.

tools.name: ListEnums
tools.description: Lists all enum types used in the library. Supports optional filter parameter.

tools.name: GetComponentExample
tools.description: Gets usage examples for a specific component.

tools.name: GetGuide
tools.description: Gets a specific documentation guide (installation, defaultvalues, whatsnew, migration, localization, styles).

tools.name: SearchGuides
tools.description: Searches documentation guides for specific content or topics.

tools.name: ListGuides
tools.description: Lists all available documentation guides with descriptions.

resources.name: All Components
resources.description: Complete list of all Fluent UI Blazor components organized by category.

resources.name: Component Categories
resources.description: List of all component categories with component counts.

resources.name: All Enum Types
resources.description: Complete list of all enum types used in the library.

resources.name: Documentation Guides
resources.description: List of all available documentation guides.

resources.name: Installation Guide
resources.description: Complete installation and setup guide for Fluent UI Blazor.

resources.name: Default Values Guide
resources.description: Guide for configuring default component values globally.

resources.name: Migration to v5
resources.description: Complete migration guide from v4 to v5 with all breaking changes.

resources.name: Localization Guide
resources.description: Guide for translating and localizing component texts.

resources.name: Styles Guide
resources.description: CSS styling, design tokens, and theming guide.

resource_templates.name: Component Documentation
resource_templates.description: Detailed documentation for a specific component including parameters, events, and methods.

resource_templates.name: Components by Category
resource_templates.description: List of all components in a specific category.

resource_templates.name: Enum Details
resource_templates.description: Detailed information about a specific enum type including all values.

prompts.name: create_component
prompts.description: Generate code for a Fluent UI Blazor component with specified configuration.

prompts.name: explain_component
prompts.description: Get a detailed explanation of a component and its usage.

prompts.name: compare_components
prompts.description: Compare two or more components to understand their differences.

prompts.name: create_form
prompts.description: Generate a complete Fluent UI Blazor form with validation.

prompts.name: create_datagrid
prompts.description: Generate a DataGrid with specified columns and features.

prompts.name: create_drawer
prompts.description: Generate a drawer/panel component for side content.

prompts.name: migrate_to_v5
prompts.description: Get guidance for migrating code from v4 to v5.

prompts.name: setup_project
prompts.description: Get step-by-step guidance for setting up a new project.

prompts.name: configure_theming
prompts.description: Get guidance for configuring theming and styles.
